name: Team Disorder
description:
Team Disorder is an open-world game that can be played in FP or TP modes. Our game includes 4 large Open World Maps. In this game, you will find Large Beaches, picturesque Villages, and Urban/Regular Jungles. Most buildings are enterable with multiple floors up to eight! 
 The story begins with our main Character Jack being shot down on a strange planet by enemy aliens. He did enjoy a safe ejection from his "Borrowed Spaceship". Upon landing, he can not help but notice the planet strongly resembles Earth. On this planet, he must engage with the very worst sort of villains. His skills will be tested with all kinds of unfriendly fire types such as Ranged fire, Melee, and magic-throwing attacks. It's a good thing he has plenty of advanced weaponry with an old-fashioned twist to recover. This game offers maps that are distinctly different and have many secret areas. With hundreds of advanced AI enemies per level, you will need to bring your best game. 
Team Disorder offers level a selection feature with a manual save system. You may advance to the next level by either completing or finding & unlocking glowing spheres. Magic books tell riddles that will lead you to massive secret levels! Join Team Disorder only When you are entirely ready for total DISORDER! 







This Game Contains Creative Commons Attributes. Visit the website for a full list of credits.
